description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the security center broker information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38155), the following KB updates must be applied:

1. Download and apply the KB5041571 update if running Windows 11 Version 24H2.
2. Download and apply the KB5041585 update if running Windows 11 Version 23H2.
3. Download and apply the KB5041592 update if running Windows 11 Version 21H2.
4. Download and apply the KB5041580 update if running Windows 10 Version 22H2 or Windows 10 Version 21H2.

**Details**:
These updates address the out-of-bounds read weaknesses in Microsoft security. Ensure your system is on the correct Windows version before applying the updates. For manual installation, visit the Microsoft Update Catalog at:
- [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
- [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
- [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
- [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible version of Windows as listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of the updates.
